snippet: Representative Jay Kim was sentenced today to two months of home confinement for accepting illegal campaign contributions.    Mr. Kim, a Republican, also was sentenced to one year of probation and a $5,000 fine. He could have received up to six mo...
lead_paragraph: Representative Jay Kim was sentenced today to two months of home confinement for accepting illegal campaign contributions. Mr. Kim, a Republican, also was sentenced to one year of probation and a $5,000 fine. He could have received up to six months in jail after pleading guilty to misdemeanor counts of accepting illegal donations.
abstract: Rep Jay Kim, California Republican, is sentenced to two months of home confinement, one year of probation and $5,000 fine for accepting illegal campaign contributions; Kim's wife, June, is sentenced to probation and fined $5,000 and his campaign committee is fined $170,000 (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Congressman Sentenced For Taking Illegal Funds
